turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have you heard anything about the new cherry mocha drink at starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I have would you like me to order you one there's one close to you on 74th street

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would I need to pick it up and deliver to the office please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Why certainly that's my entire existence has to serve you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How do I get paid the big bucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll need to know the size please any other details you need taken care of with this order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay great I'll make that venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very well is that just for you or do you care about other people in your office

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No actually I don't care about them at all just send me one for myself

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is as I suspected

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That great so how long will it be

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm going to put the order in now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me an update on my order please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: This is outstanding your order will be ready in 15 minutes I will not going to be able to do it for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great appreciate the effort of not Valerian like you said you're going to

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I aim to please

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Night while you have a good day and I will not see you at the office tomorrow

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome place while I hope you have a good day to you sir

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye-bye
